name: Designing for print in Figma / Sketch
description:
Calculating the frame sizes

Calculate the correct frame size with the desired DPI for converting into Print PDFs.


Bleed, Margin, Etc.


Getting the correct DPI in order

Export frames from Figma and convert them to correct DPI before creating the final PDFs.


Preparing the PDF for print

Once all images are in independent PDFs, join them into single PDF ready to be sent to the printer.


Compensating for CMYK conversion

I also show a hack to compensate for RGB colors so they match the correct RGB when converted to CMYK.
